name: 伊拉·冯·弗斯滕伯格
name_full: 伊拉·冯·弗斯滕伯格 Ira von Fürstenberg
introduction: Princess Virginia von Fürstenberg, known professionally as Ira von Fürstenberg, is a European socialite, actress, jewelry designer and former public relations manager for the fashion designer Valentino Garavani. She is a member by birth of the princely family of Fürstenberg and a former member by marriage of the princely family of Hohenlohe-Langenburg.
name_more_other: Virginia Carolina Theresa Pancrazia Galdina Prinzessin zu Fürstenberg (本名)
